name: Tuscan Pasta
description: Thank you, Terra Bergen, for this recipe! Creamy, rich, and satisfying, this pasta dish will transport you to Tuscany without having to leave your home! Baby spinach and the cherry tomato sauce ensures you are getting a full serving of veggies when diving into this decadent dish. Set it and forget it, then enjoy—this pasta is definitely worth the wait!
preparation: Place cream cheese in middle of a large baking dish. Add tomatoes and bacon, if using, around the cheese. Sprinkle red pepper flakes, Minced Garlic, and seasoning all over, and drizzle with oil.
Bake until cream cheese is golden, and tomatoes have started to burst, about 40 min. Add spinach as soon as it comes out of the oven and stir until cheese is smooth and the spinach is wilted.
While cheese bakes, bring a large pot of water to a boil. Cook pasta until al dente, according to package directions. Reserve 1⁄2 cup pasta water, then drain.
Add pasta to stirred sauce and 1⁄4 cup reserved pasta water. Stir to combine. Add more pasta water to help sauce come together as needed and season with salt and pepper, to taste.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: This is a perfectly balanced plate.

products.name: Pizza Seasoning (1002291)
summary: In a world of complex gastronomy, pizza is a testament to the simple pleasures we all crave. Now you can get it by the spoonful! This blend delivers the nostalgic flavors and feeling of eating pizza, with notes of basil, oregano, garlic, tomato, and green bell peppers with loads of Parmesan. And yes, there is a mild whisper of chilli, too!
